snippet: Some start-ups and developers are turning to filmmakers and creative agencies to help them drum up marketing campaigns for their apps and services. Samuel Bennett, a filmmaker and composer in New York, describes how he fell into the market.
abstract: Some start-ups and developers are turning to filmmakers and creative agencies to help them drum up marketing campaigns for their apps and services. Samuel Bennett, a filmmaker and composer in New York, describes how he fell into the market.

headline.main: One on One: Samuel Bennett, Filmmaker and App Video Director
